ai-ja185:1.3_0: a fish made of style, a peacock made of fish,
ai-ja185:1.4_0: when a person has been chewed up by their own lair,
ai-ja185:1.5_0: One does not see one’s own welfare or another’s welfare.
ai-ja185:2.1_0: Just as in clear, undisturbed water,
ai-ja185:2.3_0: a fish made of style, a peacock made of fish,
ai-ja185:3.1_0: is the fifth kind of dissatisfaction.
